levels.description:
Stops attacking; Drone <@ba.vup>+2</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and Attack Range <@ba.vup>becomes global</>. Releases Drones to attack enemies and the Drones' attacks <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> the target for <@ba.vup>{attack@sluggish}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>The Drone locks onto an enemy until the enemy is defeated, the Drone self-destructs or until the skill is over, then returns to the Operator</>
